metadata.dc:title: Abdominal tuberculosis
metadata.dc:description: Abdominal tuberculosis develops according to a non-specific clinical picture, with a difficult differential diagnosis with respect to other entities of similar semiology. ;;We present the case of a male who was admitted because of abdominal pain, progressive and notable loss of body weight and a fever of two months evolution. The culture from the colon biopsy showed the presence of Koch bacilli
metadata.dc:creator: Repiso, M
Rubio, T
Gaztelu, MT
Jiménez Bermejo, F
Sarasíbar, H
Calvo, A
Martínez Echeverría, A
metadata.dc:description: La tuberculosis abdominal cursa con un cuadro inespecífico, con difícil diagnóstico diferencial respecto a otras entidades de similar semiología. Presentamos el caso de un varón que ingresa por presentar dolor abdominal, pérdida progresiva y notoria de peso corporal y fiebre de dos meses de evolución. El cultivo de la biopsia de colon mostró presencia de bacilo de Koch
metadata.dc:source: An Sist Sanit Navar;28(2): 257-260, mayo-ago. 2005. ilus
metadata.dc:title: Tuberculosis abdominal
